resources.string: Failed to get the plug-in due to the app version incomptaible. Please upgrade MOVAhome to the latest version and try again.
Failed to download the plug-in. Please try again.
Failed to load the plug-in. Please try again.
If the addition fails, please go to the system settings to turn on the \"Create Desktop Shortcut\" permission for MOVAhome App.
Are you sure you want to delete this device?
Your phone is using cellular data network. Carrier charges may apply.\n Continue to update?
Authorization failed, please allow authorized access.
Failed to obtain permission, please grant permission manually.
Failed to obtain permission, please grant permission manually %s.
Your account is NOT authorized to access the background location, please select \"Always allow\".

Please check out following items: 
1. If your device is powered ON. 
2. If your home router is working; 
3. If your home Wi-Fi network name or password still the same as before.
4. If your device is in a good Wi-Fi network coverage.
Your login has expired. Please log in again.

This app will request the system location permissions for network configuring, nearby device scanning, Wi-Fi network identifying, country/region recognizing.

If the app cannot access the preceding permissions, the corresponding functions will NOT work while the basic functions of the app are still available. 

You can turn off or on the permissions at any time via Settings > Permissions.

This app will request system camera and photo permissions for profile photo settings and function feedback.

If the app cannot access the preceding permissions, the corresponding functions will NOT work while the basic functions of the app are still available. 

You can turn off or on the permissions at any time via Settings > Permissions.

This app will request the system camera, photo, and microphone permissions for video calls and submitting feedback.

If the app cannot access the preceding permissions, the corresponding functions will NOT work while the basic functions of the app are still available. 

You can turn off or on the permissions at any time via Settings > Permissions.

This app will request the device ID (IMEI) permissions for product improvement, personalized service, and after-sales service.

If the app cannot access the preceding permissions, the corresponding functions will NOT work while the basic functions of the app are still available. 

You can turn off or on the permissions at any time via Settings > Permissions.
请输入场景id（调试自动化，可选）
选中-调试触发条件/取消-调试动作（调试自动化，可选）
输入电脑的IP地址，您的手机可以不通过USB连接电脑，就能调试RN扩展程序！
Plug-in verification failed. Please clear the cache and try again.
Update to the latest version to experience a more excellent MOVA.
Non-Wi-Fi environment currently, continue to update?
Receiving device functioning and error messages
